name: Legend of Sonia
description:
Legend of Sonia is a 3D PC third-person shooter game made in Unity. Sonia is stuck on a small island and is being attacked by ogre warriors. The only way to survive is to kill them with her machetes.

Use the WASD or arrows keys to move Sonia. Use the left or right mousse button to make different fight attacks.

Use the heart to regain some of your health and the lighting to gain extra speed.
